page.title: 02TOURISM IN ARBROATH.
page.content: In our area there is a wide spread of activities for{tourists}to enjoy. We have Kerr's miniature railway, Smokey's discotheque,Pleasureland amusement arcade,an annual circus and fair, putting,tennis and crazy golf,as well as open space,beach and sea.People from our area,as well as tourists, flock to events such as The Abbey Pageant commemorating the Signing of the Declaration of Indep- endence at Arbroath Abbey in 1322.Many hotels and guest houses lie in our area making money from the tourists who also help local{traders}make a living.Smokey's used to be part of the large open air bathing pool which closed about 5 years ago.Once a luxury and great attraction it was eventually overtaken by the indoor,heated baths and{events}such as the beauty contests held there are held elsewhere in town.
